<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Invoice Portal User Registration">fd1dfbc91b71bcd08c5143f3cc4bcb38</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Cancel Submission if Email Invalid</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
      alert('Record submission aborted.');

      //Make sure dirty form still works
      g_form.submitted = false;

      //Abort the submission
      return false;
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-22 19:03:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>88123b411b8bcd508c5143f3cc4bcba7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cancel Submission if Email Invalid</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Invoice Portal" source="d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoice Portal">d778dcbd1b6ec9d08c5143f3cc4bcbb2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_88123b411b8bcd508c5143f3cc4bcba7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 19:03:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
